definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Example: Seeing a spider, even on the TV, always gives me the heebie-jeebies.
sentences.chinese: 即便是在電視上看到蜘蛛，我也會覺得害怕。

sentences.english: Even non-school days, they would have little success.
sentences.chinese: 即便是天才不學，也不會有多大的成就。

sentences.english: Even so, some teachers still gave us homework.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，有些老師還是佈置了寒假作業。

sentences.english: Pround since nobles tend to; he is nervous to see me.
sentences.chinese: 這些貴族只管即便傲岸，他卻畏怯見到我。

sentences.english: Even while the earth sleeps we travel.
sentences.chinese: 我們會日夜兼程，即便大地還在熟睡。

sentences.english: Even so, many activists say they are packing their bags and heading to Washington.
sentences.chinese: 即便這樣，許多倡導者說他們要收拾行裝上華盛頓。

sentences.english: Even if everything dictionary at hand, we can not only lead them.
sentences.chinese: 即便手頭的詞典應有盡有，也不能唯它們的馬首是瞻。

sentences.english: But even that does not guarantee they will be achieved.
sentences.chinese: 但是即便這樣也不能保證它們將會實現。

sentences.english: Even so, other reports showed big drops in housing sales in May. That followed the end of a homebuyer's tax credit.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，其他報告顯示五月房價大幅度下跌。

sentences.english: Some people can be forgiven because of what they do even though they are unpunctual.
sentences.chinese: 一些人因爲他們的工作可以被原諒，即便他們遲到。

sentences.english: Your mother prefers to do her own housekeeping -- even if it is a little slapdash.
sentences.chinese: 即便有點精心馬虎了，你母親還是更喜歡自己做家務。

sentences.english: Yet even industry doormats Yahoo (YHOO, Fortune 500) and AOL are profitable.
sentences.chinese: 即便萬年老二雅虎和AOL都在盈利。

sentences.english: Perhaps the city's too fast, so even the less love the original gentle enough.
sentences.chinese: 也許城市的太快了，所以即便的少愛原來的柔情似水。

sentences.english: Even the lucky ones in happy homes who have never felt my pain.
sentences.chinese: 即便是幸福家庭中的幸運兒也從未感受到我的痛苦。

sentences.english: You feel you can't walk around naked in your own flat.
sentences.chinese: 你發覺即便是在自家房子裏也不能光着膀子走。

sentences.english: Even so, the on-the-go convenience of mobile banking is attracting users in the West.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，移動銀行的便利性也正吸引西方用戶。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
